alert.note: Alert for Alpine; Tuolumne (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 10 at 5:33PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Flood Advisory for Minor Flooding in Poor Drainage Areas for... Northeastern Tuolumne County in northern California... Southeastern Alpine County in northern California... * Until 730 PM PDT. * At 531 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms on SR108 near Sonora Pass. This will cause minor road flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kennedy Meadow and poritons of SR108 near Sonora Pass. Additional rainfall of 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you can do so safely.
